1. Click **{{< fa bookmark >}} Select View**.

1. For the view you want to modify, click on **{{< fa ellipsis-vertical >}}** to edit the name or description or to delete the view:

    - To edit a view, select **{{< fa pencil >}} Edit View**. Make your edits then click **Save Changes** to apply your adjustments.
    - To remove a view, select [**{{< fa trash-can >}} Remove View**]{.red}. Once you confirm, your view will be deleted.

1. Once you confirm, the view will be deleted.
